virtual void glr::glw::OpenGlDevice::invalidateBindPoints ( )
virtual

Will 'invalidate' all active bind points, which effectively means that the next call to getBindPoint() will return the first bind point, and any buffers that are currently attached to a bind point must no longer be considered active.

This method is typically called when we are binding a new shader program.

Implements glr::glw::IOpenGlDevice.
